welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Cheadle Hulme, a charming town in the heart of the United Kingdom known for its beautiful parks and friendly atmosphere. We invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and busiest terminal at Manchester Airport, serving mostly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A modern terminal with a wide range of shops, restaurants, and lounges for passengers to enjoy.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for low-cost airlines and domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport, with premium options available for purchase.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport is the primary hub for all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport handles all low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.
